EmailTemplate.subject: Per my voice mail message - information on WEX Corporate Payment Solutions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.LastName},
I am wondering if you could give me some advice. We help organizations like {!Account.Name} with reducing the operating cost of their fleet operation. I don’t know whom I need to speak with to see if we can help you in this area.
This is where I need some help from you. Who would be the individual (within your organization), if not you, that you would recommend I meet with to look at our services to see if there’s a potential fit?
Specifically what we do is:
- Provide driver convenience – accepted at 9 of 10 US fuel stations.
- Provide control – real time authorization of card and driver ID.
- Give you savings – our tools and controls reduce unauthorized purchases.
Attached are testimonials from a few of our customers show:
- WEX provides the most detailed reporting in the industry.
- WEX Customer Service is unparalleled in the industry.
- WEX customers realize significant cost savings.
I don’t know if we could duplicate these kinds of results with your company, but wouldn’t it be interesting to find out?
I look forward to speaking with you. And, thank you for any advice you can give me.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
www.wexinc.com
